feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:11 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 8:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets in the evening and with periods of rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
